app.title: Facetune: Hair, Photo Editor
app.description:
The ultimate editing tool for stunning content - Facetune makes it effortless.
Experience the fastest, easiest way to edit with one-tap tools to bring out your best self in your photos and videos. Facetune is your one-stop AI photo editor, hair editor, and video enhancer for standout selfies, glowing portraits, and scroll-stopping videos. From hair color changer tools and teeth whitening to perfect resume-ready headshots, your next great look is just a tap away.
Whether you're editing on the fly, using retake features to refine your shot, or planning the perfect post, Facetune puts creative control in your hands - no pro skills required.

‚ú® Edit photos & videos with AI magic
 Want to glow up your latest snap or smooth out a selfie video? Facetune‚Äôs AI tools take care of everything from instant retouch options to full-on transformations. Prefer to fine-tune things yourself? Manual tools let you adjust every detail, your way.
Instantly enhance photos with filters, one-tap edits, or a custom hair filter
Retouch a single frame or apply changes across an entire video
Add glam makeup, brighten eyes, reshape features, or try bold new looks with the hair changer or hairstyle try on tools

üíÑ Try a new look in seconds
 From subtle touch-ups to glam makeovers, Facetune makes it easy to show up as your best self. Use intuitive tools to refresh tired eyes, refine your skin tone, and even test a whole new vibe.
Whiten teeth & smooth skin for that polished finish
Change your eye or hair color in just a tap with the hair color changer
Try makeup filters, reshape features, or airbrush a natural glow
Need a professional profile pic? One-tap headshot tools have you covered

üéû Edit your videos like a pro
 Make your video content shine with powerful yet simple editing tools.
Add filters, retouch faces, and brighten up your clips
Apply changes across your entire video in one go
Create Instagram-ready content with eye-catching effects

üî• AI tools that keep getting better
 Take your content further with smart features designed for creativity and ease:
Blur or replace backgrounds for that studio-look
Add light to your eyes for a captivating touch
Adjust body skin tone, add a tan, or brighten your smile
Create professional resume headshots with the AI headshot generator

üì∏ Why Facetune?
 Facetune is an all-in-one editor for unforgettable results, with both precision features and automated AI-enhanced tools. Apply teeth whitening, retouch face blemishes, blur backgrounds, reshape chin or nose, try hairstyle try on features, add effects, and so much more.
üëâ Download Facetune today - retouch, edit, try new hairstyles, and create amazing content effortlessly!
Facetune is part of the award-winning suite of creative tools:
Videoleap: AI-powered video editing made easy
Photoleap: Advanced 3D photo editing with AI

Start creating your favorite version of you.
Download Facetune today and see the difference.

Certain features shown in the screenshots may only be available on specific device models.

Terms of Use: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.html

app.summary: AI photo editor with hair editor, retouch tools, hair color changer & filters!

reviews.text: I can't believe you have to pay to do anything! I will stick to free ones that don't have ANY ads. I use "Pixlr" or "PicsArt". The second one i highly recommend, yall. You can pay $8/month for a few upgrades if you want. Otherwise most of it is free and much better than this app Response: to do anything you advertise, you have to pay for. You have very limited options if you don't pay. Again, i will stick and tell people about the apps that don't try to rip people off
reviews.replyText: Hi Abigail, happy to share that you don't need to pay to use Facetune 2! You can download it and use it for free with its many free tools. There is an option to upgrade to VIP from within the app but the choice is yours. Email us anytime with questions at facetune2.android.support@lightricks.com

reviews.text: Although this app was great, it recently updated from "Facetune" to "Facetune 2" which i was really excited for, but when I opened it up it wanted me to pay monthly or a one time $49.99 purchase to unlock all features including the patch tool and add free. When I first found out about this I downloaded the free version to see if it was worth it, leading to the full version because the adds were too much. The fact that you have to pay for the app then pay to get certain features is super shady.

Started as a fun app with lots of good editing features, one of the best I'd come across. Gradually became a still-fun app but with fewer and fewer features that weren't behind a paywall -- still, if you were willing to watch ads, it was worth the time. But now it's entirely paid except for a 3 day trial. Clearly the developers missed the point on what people actually like about the app. Good luck, I guess.
reviews.replyText: We‚Äôd like to continue this conversation further and direct your feedback to our team! Please reach out to us at facetune2.android.support@lightricks.com so we can pass along your input. Looking forward to hearing from you!

reviews.text: Edited to respond.... I have been emailing with your department and they just keep sending me bot emails and not addressing the issue. Obviously I don't have a receipt from app that I bought years ago. I'm sure you can look it up by my email address if need be. I purchased your other facetune app. It's on my phone. There are no updates for it, and then I find this app to replace it. Only now, you want 40 bucks a year? I already paid for the first one! Very bad business!!!!
reviews.replyText: Thanks for reaching out, this doesn't sound right. Can you please send us your receipt/invoice to facetune.android.support@lightricks.com so that we can help you, thank you.

reviews.text: Edit: It seems the crashes began with the new update, and I could not access it for about a week, but I think they have ended now, and it seems to be running smoothly. Overall: Great app for on-the-go, kind of photoshop editing. User friendly, and has so many editing tools to do whatever you want. Og: Crashing the past week. I have uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times. I usually love this app, and pay the subscription amount, so this is frustrating.
reviews.replyText: Sorry to hear this. Can you please contact us so we can help. To do this, please tap on the settings icon in the top right corner and then tap on Send Feedback. A contact form will appear for you to enter the details of the issue. Look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.text: This app does just about everything I want for AI assisted photo/selfie editing. The upscaling is the best I've seen. The outfits and hair AI generator could be better. The biggest issue I have, though, is that there are not enough lipstick options. I need more colors, like blues and purples. I would also like to see the option to make lipstick matte, satin, or glossy. And a hair color slider! If those things improve, this app would be the only one I'd ever need!
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your review. We‚Äôre so glad to hear that you‚Äôre enjoying Facetune. If there is anything we can do to improve your experience and turn your review into a 5-star one, please don't hesitate to let us know!

reviews.text: This app comes packed with features and is easy to use and not heavy on the purse strings. It didn't meet all my needs but I'm pretty picky. I accidentally forgot to cancel before it renewed but cancelling when I got the notice allowed me a complete refund. I wish everyboody would do that!
reviews.replyText: Thank so much for your positive review. We're so pleased to hear that you're enjoying Facetune!

reviews.text: This app was great before. I had the free trial and then uninstalled it. I decided to reinstall and purchase. What a disaster. It is not allowing me to upload a video of 39 seconds. When I edited another video, the makeup selections had changed. Previously it was very easy to select eyes, change size and color, same with eyebrows. I went to Reshape and it stays stuck on NOSE which I have no desire to change. Impossible to access eyes or eyebrows. This app is very disappointing
reviews.replyText: Sorry to hear this. Can you please contact us so we can help. To do this, please tap on the settings icon in the top right corner and then tap on Send Feedback. A contact form will appear for you to enter the details of the issue. Look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.text: I used to use this app a lot, a lot of the free features were awesome a few years ago. Now the half the features are "premium" meaning you have to pay for them. (I'm the most upset about the paint feature not being available now) The app is basically useless (at least for me) unless you want to pay monthly for it, and I don't use it often enough to justify a monthly subscription. If you want to pay for it, it's a great app otherwise I wouldn't bother.
reviews.replyText: We appreciate your feedback. We're sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with the changes we've made. We believe that our premium version offers a lot of value with its advanced features. Nonetheless, we'll take your feedback into consideration as we continue to grow our Facetune app.

reviews.text: wow üò≥ I totally understand a free version has to have ads, I do. However there is such a thing as too many and every time I clicked on anything an ad would pop up. After a long time I finally tried to save a photo and had to spend another 30 seconds watching an ad before it would save lol. Also, hardly any good features in the free version. So this is completely structured to force you to be a premium paying customer, or lose your mind and decide to delete.
reviews.replyText: We‚Äôd like to continue this conversation further and direct your feedback to our team! Please reach out to us at facetune2.android.support@lightricks.com so we can pass along your input. Looking forward to hearing from you!

app.AIReview:
Facetune: Hair, Photo Editor ‚Äì A Detailed Review

Overview

Facetune: Hair, Photo Editor has swiftly become one of the most downloaded photo editing apps available, boasting over 82 million installs and a robust 4.4-star rating from a massive user base of 770,370 individuals. This app positions itself as the ultimate solution for enhancing selfies, portraits, and even video content ‚Äì with an emphasis on hair manipulation and quick, one-tap editing. The core proposition is accessibility: providing powerful photo retouching capabilities within a seemingly effortless interface, targeting users who desire polished images without needing extensive photographic skills or complex software. The free version offers a surprising amount of functionality, while subscription options unlock advanced features like AI skin smoothing and more granular control.

Key Features

Facetune‚Äôs feature set is layered, catering to both casual users and those seeking professional-level results. Here's a breakdown:

  • One-Tap Tools: The app‚Äôs central selling point ‚Äì the ability to dramatically alter your appearance with single taps ‚Äì remains a core function. This includes features like "Smooth" (for skin smoothing), ‚ÄúEyes‚Äù (to sharpen and enlarge eyes), ‚ÄúJawline‚Äù (to define the jaw), and ‚ÄúNose‚Äù (for subtle adjustments).
  • Hair Editor: As indicated by the app‚Äôs name, the hair editor is exceptionally robust. It allows users to change hair color with a vast palette of options, adjust highlights and shadows, and even add volume and texture. The precision offered here significantly surpasses many competing apps.
  • Teeth Whitening & Skin Tone Adjustments: Beyond facial features, Facetune provides tools for whitening teeth, adjusting skin tone (including redness reduction), and controlling exposure and contrast.
  • Filters & Effects: While not the primary focus, a selection of filters and effects are available to add stylistic flair to images. These include options for vintage looks, black and white conversions, and cinematic enhancements.
  • Video Enhancement: Facetune extends beyond still photos, offering tools to improve video quality ‚Äì primarily focusing on smoothing skin and adjusting lighting within video clips.
  • Headshot Mode: Specifically designed for professional headshots, this mode offers targeted adjustments for resume-ready images with enhanced clarity and a polished appearance.
  • AI-Powered Features (Premium): The premium subscription unlocks AI-powered features like ‚ÄúSkin AI,‚Äù which automatically smooths skin imperfections, and "Body AI," designed to subtly reshape the body.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: Facetune truly excels in its simplicity. The intuitive one-tap tools make it incredibly easy for anyone ‚Äì regardless of their editing experience ‚Äì to dramatically improve their photos. The visual feedback is immediate, allowing users to quickly see the impact of each adjustment.
  • Powerful Hair Editing: The hair editor is arguably the app's strongest feature. It provides an unparalleled level of control over hair color and style, rivaling dedicated beauty applications. This functionality alone justifies a significant portion of the user base‚Äôs interest.
  • Fast Results: The one-tap tools deliver noticeable improvements almost instantly. This speed is crucial for social media users who need to quickly refine their photos before posting.
  • Large User Base & Community: With over 82 million installs, Facetune benefits from a large and active user community, offering ample opportunities for inspiration and tutorials.

Areas for Improvement

  • Premium Lockout: Many of the most impactful features ‚Äì particularly those leveraging AI ‚Äì are locked behind the premium subscription. This can be frustrating for users who enjoy using the free version but want access to the full suite of tools.
  • Limited Filter Variety (Free): The selection of filters available in the free version is noticeably smaller than in the premium version, limiting creative options for users solely relying on the free tier.
  • Over-Smoothing Potential: While ‚ÄúSmooth‚Äù is a popular tool, overuse can lead to an unnatural and plastic-looking effect, particularly with skin retouching. More granular controls regarding smoothing intensity would be beneficial.
  • Video Editing Limitations: The video editing capabilities are comparatively basic compared to dedicated video editing apps.

User Experience

The user experience within Facetune is remarkably polished and intuitive. The interface is clean and uncluttered, making navigation effortless. The app‚Äôs responsiveness is excellent, with adjustments applied almost instantaneously. The tutorial system, while present, isn't overly intrusive ‚Äì it gently guides users through the key features without feeling overwhelming. The ability to easily switch between different editing tools and adjust their intensity contributes significantly to a positive user experience. A notable aspect is the consistent visual feedback provided by each adjustment, allowing for precise control.

Value for Money

The free version of Facetune provides considerable value, particularly for casual users who primarily want to tweak their selfies. However, to unlock the app‚Äôs full potential ‚Äì specifically AI-powered features and a wider range of filters ‚Äì a subscription is necessary. Pricing varies depending on the region, but typically sits around $9.99 per month or $59.99 per year. Considering the power of the hair editor and the convenience of one-tap tools, the premium subscription represents a reasonable investment for serious users who regularly edit photos and videos. The annual subscription offers the best overall value.

Conclusion

Facetune: Hair, Photo Editor is a remarkably effective photo editing app that delivers on its promise of effortless beauty enhancement. Its intuitive interface, powerful hair editor, and fast results make it an appealing option for a broad range of users ‚Äì from social media enthusiasts to those creating professional headshots. While the premium subscription model may deter some, the core functionality within the free version is robust enough for many needs. The app‚Äôs success underscores the growing demand for accessible and effective photo editing tools in a mobile environment. Despite needing some minor improvements regarding feature availability and potentially refining the AI smoothing algorithm, Facetune remains a top contender in the photography category and deserves its high rating.
